author: funnygiulio
content:
Oh this was also our approach:
https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/blob/main/cl/ssz/encode.go

author: funnygiulio
content: You do need to define interfaces for each actual object, but if you want to do it with tags, it is possible, but that WILL make it very slow for big objects. This is a tradeoff beetwen pure encoder and autogen to get the best of both worlds.
